newsitem.title: UK: IPE gas oil seen up $1.50, Brent 5-10 cents down,.
newsitem.headline: IPE gas oil seen up $1.50, Brent 5-10 cents down,.

text.p: IPE gas oil futures were expected to open around $1.50 a tonne higher on Friday with Brent crude 5-10 cents a barrel lower, after the United Nations said overnight it expected to give Iraq's aid distribution plan the green light early next week, brokers said.
But while brokers said the U.N. news was already factored-in and was unlikely to throw the market, the trend was downwards.
"The U.N. news was already doing the rounds on Thursday afternoon," one broker said. "But I don't see crude making fresh highs."
